events.title: Resistencia Cultural Fair
events.desc: A vibrant cultural fair featuring local artisans, traditional music, and regional food specialties at Plaza 25 de Mayo.

events.title: Dinosaur Expo: Jurassic Wonders
events.desc: Explore life-sized dinosaur replicas and learn about prehistoric times at the Guido Miranda Cultural Center.

events.title: Evening of Jazz and Art
events.desc: A relaxing evening with live jazz performances and an exhibition of local artists at the Casa de las Culturas.
